Headline: Yellow Line  Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running with delays due to signal problems

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running with delays due to signal problems

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
